name: Ukraine Simulator
description:
Feel yourself in the role of Ukraine's President. Fulfil your election pledges.

Key game features:
- Management eleven ministries
- Construction of factories and mines
- The development of agriculture
- Warfighting and the capture of countries
- The development of service
- Selection of the country's development path.

Pay attention to your personal safety. Conduct permanent fighting corruption. Get a hundred per cent people’s trust.
Good luck, Mr. President! Ukraine needs a strong leader!
